name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
desc: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.

values.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>15%</color>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>125%</color> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>18%</color>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>150%</color> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>21%</color>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>175%</color> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>24%</color>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.
